Uses of Interface
com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu.MenuSelector

    Package Description
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.events

    • Uses of MenuSelector in com.foreach.across.modules.web.events

      Methods in com.foreach.across.modules.web.events that return MenuSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MenuSelector BuildMenuEvent.getMenuSelector()
      Retrieve the menu selector that is attached to this event.
      Methods in com.foreach.across.modules.web.events with parameters of type MenuSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BuildMenuEvent.setMenuSelector(MenuSelector menuSelector)
      Set the MenuSelector that should be used for selecting the active items, after the Menu has been built by the MenuFactory.

    • Uses of MenuSelector in com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu

      Classes in com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu that implement MenuSelector 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RequestMenuSelector
      Will search a menu for the item that best matches with the requested url.
      class  TraversingMenuSelector
      Simple implementation of MenuSelector that will iterate over all items in a menu tree and find the lowest item that matches.
      Methods in com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu that return MenuSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MenuSelector MenuSelector.byHttpServletRequest(@NonNull javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Create a MenuSelector that will look for the item best matching the HttpServletRequest.
      static MenuSelector MenuSelector.byName(String name)
      Creates a MenuSelector that will look for the MenuItem with the given name.
      static MenuSelector MenuSelector.byPath(String path)
      Creates a MenuSelector that will look for the MenuItem with the given path.
      static MenuSelector MenuSelector.byTitle(String title)
      Creates a MenuSelector that will look for the MenuItem with the given title.
      static MenuSelector MenuSelector.byUrl(String url)
      Creates a MenuSelector that will look for the MenuItem with the given url.
      Methods in com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu with parameters of type MenuSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Menu Menu.getItem(MenuSelector selector)
      Fetches the item that matches the given MenuSelector.
      boolean Menu.select(MenuSelector selector)
      Sets the item matching the MenuSelector as as selected.
